content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Automation Science Pack Production Setup at position(8.5, 13.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Assembling machine-1 at position(8.5, 13.5)
- Input burner inserter for iron gears at position(8.5, 11.5) with wooden chest at position(8.5, 10.5)
- Input burner inserter for copper plates at position(8.5, 16.5) with wooden chest at position(8.5, 17.5)
- Output burner inserter at position(10.5, 13.5) with wooden chest at position(11.5, 13.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components with 11 belts

###Coal Mining Setup at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position(41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden chest at position(41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter at position(41.5, -79.5) moving coal from drill to chest

###Iron Plate Production at position(-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position(-28.0, -61.0)
- Input wooden chest at position(-27.5, -59.5)
- Input burner inserter at position(-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at position(-25.0, -59.0)
- Output burner inserter at position(-23.5, -58.5)
- Output wooden chest at position(-22.5, -58.5) containing iron plates

###Additional Iron Production at position(-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position(-18.0, -53.0)
- Input wooden chest at position(-17.5, -51.5)
- Input burner inserter at position(-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at position(-15.0, -51.0)
- Output burner inserter at position(-13.5, -50.5)
- Output wooden chest at position(-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates

###Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position(-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at position(-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected pipe systems for water and steam
- Electric pole network connecting power consumers

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities in occupied spaces
- Check if target position is free before placing entities
- When placing entities next to other entities, ensure proper spacing and direction
- Consider using different spacing values or directions if initial placement fails

### Errors with inserter placement
- Verify that inserter placement won't conflict with existing transport belts or electric poles
- Ensure proper spacing between inserters and target entities

### Inventory related errors
- Verify required items are in inventory before attempting to insert them into containers
- Craft required items before attempting to use them in construction

### Entity placement coordination errors
- Plan the layout of production lines to avoid entity conflicts
- Consider the space requirements of all components in a production setup
- Remove blocking entities before placing new ones in their place

### Fuel related warnings
- Keep mining drills and inserters supplied with fuel to maintain operation
- Monitor fuel levels in burner entities
